ai-tha-ap382:0.3_0: ° to directly experience the fruit of Once-Returning,
ai-tha-ap382:2.2_0: Having raised my joined palms to him,
ai-tha-ap382:3.2_0: that I’ve drunk the iron ball,
ai-tha-ap382:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap382:5.1_0: It was so welcome for me
ai-tha-ap382:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Kāka.
ai-tha-ap382:8.1_0: having seen the ten Elders fruits, for the ten Elders.
ai-tha-ap382:9.1_0: The eighth day of the Bodhi tree is finished.
ai-tha-ap382:11.3_0: the fragrant and the pierced thought,
ai-tha-ap382:11.5_0: my fruit, and the goods are made of the fruit.
ai-tha-ap382:11.6_0: Each verses consisting in the sense.
